author: gstein
msg: Write a new function for discovering the details behind a node's deletion.
As you can see from the docstring, the combinatorics are a bit crazy. The
storage and the implementation are actually quite straight-forward.
This revision also begins the introduce of the new "base-deleted" presence
value. The new status code may end up for internal-use only.
(): mention new presence values in list of valid presences
(WORKING_NODE.presence): document the possible presence values and their
meanings, along with information about how deletes are handled.
(WORKING_NODE.moved_to): note that the moved-away nodes will be marked
(enum statement_keys, statements): new statement to gather information
about presence values and the moved_to value.
